sect2.title: Send by Email
sect2.para:
You can access this command from the main menu through
File Send by Emailâ€¦ .
This command opens a dialog with the name of the image to be sent via email (you can edit it). Clicking on the Send button opens your local default mail software with the image attached.

note.para: This command is only available on Unix/Linux-like operating systems with the xdg-utils package installed, or if your GIMP version was explicitly created (compiled) with Sendmail support.
